headline: Fund Manager Explains Why She Prefers Palo Alto Networks (PANW)  Over Crowdstrike
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Stocks in Wall Street’s Watchlist. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) stands against other stocks in Wall Street’s watchlist. Dan Niles, Niles Investment Management founder, in a latest program on CNBC reiterated his concerns about a slowdown […]

headline: A job applicant can be deepfaked into existence in 70 minutes, cybersecurity firm finds
summary: Fraudsters exploit video interview vulnerabilities to dupe employers, Palo Alto Networks said, but employers may be able to spot suspicious candidates.

raw.headline: A job applicant can be deepfaked into existence in 70 minutes, cybersecurity firm finds

headline: Brokers Suggest Investing in Palo Alto (PANW): Read This Before Placing a Bet
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Palo Alto (PANW) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

summary: SAN JOSE, Calif. - Exaforce today announced $75 million in Series A funding led by marquee investors Khosla Ventures, Mayfield, and Thomvest Ventures to develop its Agentic SOC Platform that combines...
